gw.plugin.document

Class IDocumentProductionBase

  • gw.plugin.document.IDocumentProductionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IDocumentProductionBase
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    An interface to a Document Production system. This interface will be used to create documents both synchronously and asynchronously, and both as a direct result of user action and from rules (or other Gosu). Synchronous creation means that the document contents are generated immediately and returned to the calling method for further processing. In this scenario, the caller is responsible for persisting the document to the DMS system (if desired). Asynchronous creation means that the document contents may not be generated for some time, or may require extra workflow processing and/or manual intervention. The contents of the document are not returned, although a URL or other information allowing the checking of state may be, and the IDocumentProduction implementation is responsible for adding the document to the DMS system and notifying the Guidewire software upon successful completion of the document.

      • asynchronousCreationSupported

        boolean asynchronousCreationSupported(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor)
        Can a document be created from this template asynchronously?
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based
        Returns:
        true if asynchronous creation is supported, fales if not

      • createDocumentAsynchronously

        String createDocumentAsynchronously(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                  Map<K,V> parameters)
        Attempt to create a document in an asynchronous manner.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template from which to create the document.
        parameters - Any objects which may be required for document creation (for context object values, for example)
        Returns:
        A URL which the user could visit to see the status of the document creation, or null if none exists

      • createDocumentAsynchronously

        String createDocumentAsynchronously(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                  Map<K,V> parameters,
                                  Map<K,V> fieldValues)
        Attempt to create a document in an asynchronous manner.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template from which to create the document.
        parameters - Any objects which may be required for document creation (for context object values, for example)
        fieldValues - A name->value Map of values which should be set in the new Document's metadata, once it is created
        Returns:
        A URL which the user could visit to see the status of the document creation, or null if none exists
